title: Phantom Elite Paranormal Ghost Haunting_(aka PEP_PMPI) WebSeries
description:
Phantom Elite Paranormal Ghost Haunting_(aka PEP_PMPI) WebSeries (2012-2013) (mp4s)


Heres another home grown USA paranormal Team. If you like seeing NON-TV (raw)
stuff and paranormal and seeing the said haunted locations then you will like this collection. Mostly EVPs and ghost box stuff evidence from what I saw while editing/converting it.

However some episodes could do with better music and editing
dont like that heavy metal guitar tracks myself LOL later episodes music way better
though.(opening credits/title)

The editing and filming seems to get better in later episodes as well.
they really need to have Results always at the end of a investigation (and add
to end of the video not make it an extra video clip) and better HD cameras
if they want to compete with some of the previous ghost teams and shows
ive uploaded..


also I wish they would put the episode and investigation dates in the names
of the files and titles. would help muchly.. as I spent 2 hours editing these
and putting them in order


I like how theyre using the xbox Kenetics to detect movement with IR in 3D and color.
not sure how affective it is.. but its something new to try to capture
paranormal movement I guess

Not watch any yet just skimmed..(so not sure which are the best episodes to watch first) but they use the Xbox thingy in Episode 24
and the Episode 00 have clips and Test gear they are building.


Its A big 4gb Collection.. so HELP seed if grabbing else it take longer to
seed out..

thanks.
